verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who is like Him?
The Lion and the Lamb
Seated on the throne
Mountains bow down,
every ocean roars
To the Lord of hosts

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Praise Adonai
From the rising of the sun
To the end of every day
Praise Adonai
All the nations of the earth
All the angels and the saints
sing praise
